name: Haunted Hunter
description:
Be a treasure hunter in a Minecraft-styled haunted building! Meanwhile, don't let ghosts drive you insane or you lose the game!

Control:
WASD    - Movement
Spacebar - Jump
Left click - Open chest

Objective:
1. Search for the key from chests and collect treasure as much as you can!
2. Escape through the doors when you get the key to win the level, or keep collecting the remaining treasures!
3. Avoid the roaming ghosts. They will reduce your sanity, if your sanity depletes completely then you will die of insanity and lose the game!
